meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>accustomed</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to become accustomed</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: What have you <vocabulary>become accustomed to</vocabulary>? All the <reading>Na</reading>rwhals (な) you hang out with. They take some getting used to.
